title.narrative: Improvement of industrial statistics and development of indicators of industrial performance for policy-relevant analysis in selected countries of Eastern Europe and Central Asia - Phase II

description.narrative: The project marks the second phase of Regional project (SAP 120443) which was successfully completed in 2019. In this phase, the project will continue to assist the recipient countries to improve the quality of industrial statistics that are relevant in the context of the emerging demands of data for SDG indicators, economic integration of countries to regional and global market and promotion of Industry 4.0, with special focus on productivity, digital economy and women#s empowerment. In continuation of the technical work commenced by the phase, this project will further emphasize the implementation of UN recommendations related to general industrial statistics, index numbers of industrial production and business dynamics and entrepreneurship and statistics of small industrial enterprises.
